name: JoinUp recruiting bot
author: Joinup

sections.description:
JoinUp is the easiest way to add a recruiting bot to your site.

97% of your carreer page visitors leave without applying! It’s time to change that.
JoinUp is the solution to source, screen and hire more quality candidates.

Capture applications

Recruiting bot allow you to convert your visitors into candidates.

Prequalify your applications

Ask the candidates custom questions.

Improve Your employer brand

You offer a great application experience for your candidates.

Features

Key Features

  • Recruiting bots start conversations in the right place at the right time.
  • JoinUp bot enables you to engage every single candidate and collect more applications
  • The recruiting bots give you pre-qualified candidates. You can immediately process applications on your dedicated dashboard.
  • Bots integrate with your website and act as an extension of your HR team.

Usage

After enabling the plug in, head on to the widget customization page to change settings and integrate its look and feel to match your site. When done, enable it by visiting the account configuration page and completing the instant signup process.
sections.installation:
Server Requirements: PHP4 or PHP5.

WordPress versions: WordPress 2.7 and up.

Note: You will need a free JoinUp account : Create one for free here!.

Step-by-step Guide:

  • Install the plugin from WordPress directory and activate it.
  • Under settings section, click on JoinUp to add your JoinUp bot id
  • Customize the bot to your preference.
  • Finally, make full use of our Dashboard to manage your applications.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Server Requirements: PHP4 or PHP5.

WordPress versions: WordPress 2.7 and up.

Note: You will need a free JoinUp account : Create one for free here!.

Step-by-step Guide:

  • Install the plugin from WordPress directory and activate it.
  • Under settings section, click on JoinUp to add your JoinUp bot id
  • Customize the bot to your preference.
  • Finally, make full use of our Dashboard to manage your applications.

What does JoinUp let me do?

JoinUp adds a bot to your site which candidates can use to apply to a position in your company.

Do I have to install any software on my server to get this working?

Not at all! JoinUp is a hosted recruiting bot service. Simply configure the bot and you’re done!

Which web browsers work best with this plugin

JoinUp works with all environments mobile and desktop.
